name: Square Force!
description:
Well.. Here is my first game jam game!

Thanks to Brackeys and the other organisers for putting on this event!

-- How to play --

Collect cubes to fight in an army against the red enemies. Collect points and exchange them for upgrades in the store!

LMB - Shoot

WASD - Move

Use the cursor to aim!

Hope you enjoy, any feedback would be greatly appreciated!

(Mac and Linux versions are currently untested!)
